info.author: Aaron Maxwell
classifiers: License :: OSI Approved :: GNU General Public License v3 (GPLv3)
info.description:
`pyburrow` is a Python 3 library for crawling websites: capturing,
archiving and processing their resources.  It is different from all
other known crawlers by being very *low level*: the HTTP response body
is stored as raw unencoded bytes, and further the HTTP response
headers and status codes are stored as well.  The resulting rich data
set is a trove for data mining and analysis.
info.license: License :: OSI Approved :: GNU General Public License v3 (GPLv3)

The resulting rich data set is a trove for data mining and analysis.
